name: PastPerfectRadio
0:
”Alexa play Past Perfect Radio”
”Alexa launch Past Perfect Radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: past perfect radio
Developer Terms of Use
des: Past Perfect Radio is an easy listening digital radio station. We are certainly not a radio station for ‘old people’. We just dig the vintage aspects of life and love wallowing in the sound of easy listening. The music we play offers a unique alternative to what you hear on other radio stations.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
